segments.text: It's heartbreaking seeing this family moment turn risky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so absorbed in her routine, missing the flood at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's wasting away, soaking everything it touches.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on that stool looks so vulnerable, one wrong move and he'll fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His little reach for the cookies shows innocent mischief, but it's dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl waits eagerly, unaware of the peril too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could end in tears or worse, a trip to the hospital.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The peaceful garden outside contrasts the indoor trouble so sadly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's drying dishes like it's any normal day, but it's not.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a pang watching the puddle grow unattended.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: These kids deserve better supervision in their playful quest.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene tugs at my heart, full of unnoticed sorrow.
segments.speaker: PAR
